General.Name: Nano Nuclear Energy Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: NANO Nuclear Energy Inc. operates as a nuclear energy company. The company is developing ZEUS, a solid core battery reactor; and ODIN, a low-pressure salt coolant reactor. It is also developing a high-assay low-enriched uranium fuel processing facility to provide a fuel pipeline for nuclear reactor industry, and fuel transportation and nuclear consultation businesses. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 10 Times Square, New York, NY, United States, 10018
